title: BMO chime with Dave available
description: Verify BMO can initiate a voice conversation via chime when Dave is at his desk

steps.action: Ensure voice client is running and registered with daemon
Trigger a calendar reminder event in the daemon (or manually call the voice notification function)
steps.expected: Daemon POSTs chime request to voice client's callback URL
Distinctive chime sound plays through speakers
Client captures audio, sends to daemon for confirmation detection
BMO speaks the notification (e.g., 'Hey Dave, Ladew Gardens camp registration opens at 9.')
